ch0256_10_nezz/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, it’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Seems like
you’re off to do some training.
ch0256_10_nezz/0101_0701_02_10:
Do you need me to cheer for you? Or do you want
to jam with me?
ch0256_10_nezz/7101_0701_01_10:
Meeting people is like having a jam session. You
inspire each other.
ch0256_10_nezz/7101_0701_02_10:
You have to think about what you can do for
someone, not just what you can get from ’em.
ch0256_10_nezz/7101_0701_03_10: What I can do is...sing, I guess.
ch0256_10_nezz/7102_0701_01_10:
I had a concert on Pasio and it opened my eyes to
fresh inspiration.
ch0256_10_nezz/7102_0701_02_10:
Now my mind is flooded with new tunes
and lyrics.
ch0256_10_nezz/7103_0701_01_10: My Toxtricity always looks down on others.
ch0256_10_nezz/7103_0701_02_10:
That includes you and me—he looks down
on everyone.
ch0256_10_nezz/7103_0701_03_10: But that’s what makes him a rock star.
ch0256_10_nezz/7104_0701_01_10: I can’t really explain why I make music...
ch0256_10_nezz/7104_0701_02_10:
I’m not great with words, so it’s best for me to
express myself by singin’.
ch0256_10_nezz/7105_0701_01_10:
After coming to Pasio, I’ve learned how to perform
different types of music, but I still need to get
better at battlin’.
ch0256_10_nezz/7105_0701_02_10:
It’d be nice if you could train with me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0256_10_nezz/1701_0702_01_10: Use it as much as you like.
ch0256_10_nezz/2501_0701_02_10: the emotions I feel from him shake my soul.
ch0256_10_nezz/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s like he’s telling me to beat out rapid rhythms—
to sing my heart out!
ch0256_10_nezz/2501_0702_01_10: Hear the cry of my heart!
ch0256_10_nezz/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ll be holding a concert again soon, so
please come.
ch0256_10_nezz/2511_0701_02_10:
I promise you a special seat. It’ll be even better
than the front row...
ch0256_10_nezz/2511_0701_03_10:
You’ll be on stage. That’s what I call the
best seat in the house.
ch0256_10_nezz/2511_0702_01_10: I think I could make the best music if it’s with you.
ch0256_10_nezz/2511_0702_03_10:
Put your feelings into a song, and perform it for
me and the crowd.
ch0256_10_nezz/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning is a time for beginnings. And if your soul
is weepin’, then I’ll sing for you.
ch0256_10_nezz/3003_0701_01_10:
Time to get active. I’ll go adventurin’ to seek
new music.
ch0256_10_nezz/3005_0701_01_10:
The quiet night is perfect for composing music.
I need the alone time.
